rules_text:
Mill five cards. You may choose up to two nonland cards with mana value 2 or less milled this way. You may cast one without paying its mana cost. Put the rest into your hand.
Coalesce {6}{G}{W} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for {6}{G}{W}. If you do, it enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
Flying, vigilance
